mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `price_base` t1 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.enabled = '1' AND t1.warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode}

SELECT
FROM `price_base` t1 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.enabled = '1' ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC ;
